OrcaLogic, Inc - http://www.OrcaLogic.com presents...

Project: MISMO.Net v1.0 (MISMO 2.3.1)

About:

MISMO.Net is a framework developed in C# and completely modeled after MISMO 2.3.1 from
the ground up. It supports the following features:

- Full AUS context of MISMO 2.3.1
- SQL 2000 data persisting
- Completely serializable
- Renders a valid MISMO AUS xml instance document


Change History:

* 1.0 Build 20040928.2315

- Packaged and released to SourceForge.net
